roleset.name: to monitor while in motion

example.name: passive
example.text: The only difference is , [0] in those cities the poor are housed [*-1]in high-rise-project apartments each consisting of one room , with rusty pipes called [*] plumbing , rodents and cockroaches everywhere and nonworking elevators -- and with [the building] -1 patrolled [*]-1 by gangs and drug dealers .

example.name: arg 1
example.text: An officer of the Maine marine patrol is issued a multitude of equipment
